channel.title: Technically Lewb
channel.description: Weekly fun and informative takes on the latest in tech and gaming, from GTA leaks to wild new gadgets.

item.title: Week 1: GTA Leaks, CoD Goes Hollywood, and a VR Suit That Makes You Sweat
item.description:
1. GTA 6 Leaks... Again?

Just when Rockstar thought they plugged the leaks...

2. Call of Duty: Black Ops Gulf War – Full Reveal Incoming

The worst-kept secret in gaming might finally get its moment...

3. Tech Spotlight: The VR Suit That Makes You Sweat

A startup called OWO has created a haptic feedback suit...

4. Bonus Bytes:

  • Apple’s AI assistant rumors are heating up...
  • Tesla’s “Autopark Anywhere” update...
  • Steam Spring Sale just ended...

Stay Technically Lewb.
